name: dock
title: Dock
description: Change the dock's position to the left, right, or bottom edge of the screen.
author: pradeepb28

commands.name: move-dock-to-the-left
commands.title: Move Dock To The Left
commands.subtitle: Dock
commands.description: Change the dock's position to the left

commands.name: move-dock-to-the-right
commands.title: Move Dock To The Right
commands.subtitle: Dock
commands.description: Change the dock's position to the right

commands.name: move-dock-to-the-bottom
commands.title: Move Dock To The Bottom
commands.subtitle: Dock
commands.description: Change the dock's position to the bottom

commands.name: move-dock
commands.title: Move Dock
commands.subtitle: Dock
commands.description: Change the dock's position to the left, bottom or right

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
